DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Tinospora Crispa-extract Product reduce pyretic similar acetaminophen . This study aim investigate efficacy safety Tinospora Crispa-extract product compare acetaminophen . Total 96 patient body temperature 37.8-38.5 without sign infection enrol study . Patients randomly divide 3 group : First group receive acetaminophen 1000 mg every 6 hr , Second group receive Tinospora Crispa-extract Product 2000 mg twice daily third group receive placebo twice daily .
DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy Safety Tinospora Crispa-extract Product Compared With Acetaminophen
DOC.detailed_description: Patients group monitor body temperature baseline ( time enrollment ) 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 24 h receiving test material .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Body temperature 37.838.5 Body weight less 40 kg 100 kg Liver enzymes exceed 2 time normal value Can comply study protocol Have allergic history test compound Fever cause , URI Take herbal medicine 2 week enrollment Physicians decide withdraw subject reason
